entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
